content: I'm no longer able to connect at https://inferno.healthit.gov/ ...known issue? is there a status page somewhere?
OK, its back up for me now

Sorry about that! This was a wider healthit.gov issue so it was out of our control. Good question about the status page -- while we are happy to have people use inferno.healthit.gov, we haven't positioned it to be a 'service' and encourage folks to run it locally if planning to use it frequently.
